content: hawaiian fruit crocheted mango banana pineapple coconut and papaya version a-2 january 7 2007 materials needed -any worsted weight wool i used fisherman s wool small amounts of each color -g hook or hook needed to obtain gauge -stuffing of your choice this can be wool roving polyester fiberfill fabric scraps of yarn…use your imagination -stiff hook side of velcro or similar touchtape gauge 4 5 sts and 4 5 row per inch in single_crochet mango i made the mango with undyed natural yarn and then dip- dyed it with kool-aid after it was crocheted and stuffed foundation round w/ red or orange or natural see above chain 2 8 nd single_crochet in 2 chain from hook join w/ slip_stitch 8 single_crochet st round 1 chain 1 single_crochet in 1 st 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next st around join w/ slip_stitch 12 single_crochet round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in the next 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the next single_crochet around join w/ sl st 16 single_crochet round 3 chain 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch round 4 chain 1 single_crochet in the next 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the next single_crochet around join w/ sl st 20 single_crochet round 5 repeat round 3 round 6 chain 1 single_crochet in the next 4 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the next single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch 24 single_crochet round 7 chain 1 single_crochet in the next 5 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the next single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch 28 single_crochet rnds 8-11 repeat round 3 round 12 chain 1 single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 24 single_crochet round 13 chain 1 single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 20 single_crochet round 14 chain 1 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 16 single_crochet round 15 chain 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 12 single_crochet stuff round 16 chain 1 single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 6 single_crochet finish off leaving 6 tail sew closed banana nd foundation round w/ brown chain 2 4 single_crochet in 2 chain from hook join w/ slip_stitch 4 single_crochet finish off st round 1 w/ yellow chain 1 2 single_crochet in 1 st single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in last st join w/ slip_stitch 6 single_crochet round 2 chain 1 2 single_crochet in 1st st single_crochet in next 4 sts 2 single_crochet in last st join w/ slip_stitch 8 single_crochet round 3 chain 1 2 single_crochet in 1st st single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in next 2 st single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in last st join w/ slip_stitch 12 single_crochet rnds 4-10 chain 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch round 11 chain 1 2 single_crochet in 1st st single_crochet in each st around to the last st 2 single_crochet in last st join w/ slip_stitch 14 single_crochet round
